metadata.Title: CVE-2017-1000206 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: samtools htslib library version 1.4.0 and earlier is vulnerable to buffer overflow in the CRAM rANS codec resulting in potential arbitrary code execution It was discovered that HTSlib incorrectly handled certain data. An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: htslib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
